item.title: Campus Cleanout Days Scheduled this Summer
item.description: Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) and Environmental & Site Services (E&SS) are partnering with the campus community to encourage cleanouts of cluttered storage areas, offices, shops, and labs. Take advantage of these free events to prepare your spaces for the upcoming fall semester!

item.title: Arch After Hours! RPI Players
item.description: Date: Friday, August 1, 2025 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM - “Arch After Hours!” is a fast-paced sketch comedy show written and performed by the RPI Players. Get ready for a night of laughs, surprises, and unforgettable moments! Catch the show live at the C+CC August 1st at 7:00PM, August 2nd at 8:00PM and August 3rd at 2:00PM. Tickets are just $5 for RPI students and $10 for general admission. Order in advance using the form below and save $1 per ticket. Don’t miss it!

item.title: Webinars to be Included in Webex Suite
item.description: The Webex Suite meeting platform will include Webinars as of July 31, 2025. All Webinars, including those scheduled prior to this date but running after July 31, will be run on the new platform. In order to utilize the new experience, the installed Webex App must be version 45.4 or newer. If you need assistance to update your Webex App, please submit a support request.

item.description: Date: Friday, August 1, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - This 30-minute information session is hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., and will focus on Rensselaer’s Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree. item.title: Information Session for 2026 Project RFP: IBM-RPI Future of Computing Research Collaboration (FCRC)
item.description: Please join us on Thursday, August 7, 11am – 12pm for an Information Session regarding the Request for Joint Rensselaer/IBM Research Proposals. This RFP is part of the Future of Computing Research Collaboration (FCRC), a collaborative research initiative between RPI and IBM to drive world class innovation and fundamental advances in artificial intelligence algorithm, AI hardware software co-design and Semiconductor Technology for the benefit of society. Please register at https://fcrc.rpi.edu/

item.description:
